channel.title: Portfolios on Game Design Quest
channel.description: Recent content in Portfolios on Game Design Quest

item.title: Portfolio
item.description:
<div class="row">
  <div class="col-lg-4 col-md-4 col-sm-4 col-xs-12 text-center">
    <a><i class="fa fa-3x fa-code fa-fw text-warning"></i></a>
    <p class="text-left">We can answer your need for HTML5 and Unity game development. For Html5, we use
      <strong>our open source game engine Meta2d</strong>, offering clean and easy to edit code.</p>
  </div>
  <div class="col-lg-4 col-md-4 col-sm-4 col-xs-12 text-center">
    <a><i class="fa fa-3x fa-fw fa-paint-brush text-info"></i></a>
    <p class="text-left">We design
      <strong>appealing characters and environments, clear UI elements and polished cut-out animations</strong> made with Spine or Photoshop to serve your creative vision.</p>
  </div>
  <div class="col-lg-4 col-md-4 col-sm-4 col-xs-12 text-center">
    <a><i class="fa fa-3x fa-fw fa-youtube-play text-danger"></i></a>
    <p class="text-left">We have a library of
      <strong>dozens of deep and instructive tutorials</strong> to prove our expertise. Find them all on the <a href="https://www.youtube.com/c/gdquest">GDquest youtube channel</a>.</p>
  </div>
</div>

<div class="row">
  <a href="mailto:nathan.lovato.art@gmail.com">
    <img src="button-hire-us.png" alt="Hire Us!" class="img-responsive center-block" />
  </a>
</div>


<div class="row">
  <div class="col-lg-3 col-md-3 col-sm-6 col-xs-6">
    <img src="Avatars/avatar-nathan.png" class="img-responsive center-block">
    <h4>Nathan Lovato - Game Designer</h4>
    <p>
      <strong>Nathan</strong> is the author of the <a href="http://youtube.com/c/gdquest">GDquest Youtube channel</a>. He is both a professional designer and a tutor.</p>
  </div>
  <div class="col-lg-3 col-md-3 col-sm-6 col-xs-6">
    <img src="Avatars/avatar-magicfred.png" class="img-responsive center-block">
    <h4>MagicFred - Game Artist</h4>
    <p>MagicFred is a game artist with more than 15 years working in the industry. Founder of Dijiko, he designed and released a variety of games on web and mobile platforms.</p>
  </div>
  <div class="col-lg-3 col-md-3 col-sm-6 col-xs-6">
    <img src="Avatars/avatar-arthur.png" class="img-responsive center-block">
    <h4>Arthur Shefer - Developer</h4>
    <p>Arthur is the author of the open source JS game engine meta2d. He worked on the top grossing web and mobile game My Country as a front end developer.</p>
  </div>
  <div class="col-lg-3 col-md-3 col-sm-6 col-xs-6">
    <img src="Avatars/avatar-clement.png" class="img-responsive center-block">
    <h4>Clement Brard - Developer</h4>
    <p>Cl√©ment is a Unity developer with more than 5 years of experience. He is the author of Lord of the Dungeon.</p>
  </div>
</div>


<div class="row">
  <div class="col-lg-4 col-md-4 col-sm-4 col-xs-6">
    <img src="Content/gdquest-game-design-portfolio-7.png" class="img-responsive" alt="Kiwitiki's Submarine">
  </div>
  <div class="col-lg-4 col-md-4 col-sm-4 col-xs-6">
    <img src="Content/gdquest-game-design-portfolio-8.png" class="img-responsive" alt="Kiwitiki's Submarine">
  </div>
  <div class="col-lg-4 col-md-4 col-sm-4 col-xs-6">
    <img src="Content/gdquest-game-design-portfolio-9.png" class="img-responsive" alt="Kiwitiki's Submarine">
  </div>
</div>

<div class="row">
  <div class="col-lg-4 col-md-4 col-sm-4 col-xs-6">
    <img src="Content/gdquest-game-design-portfolio-1.png" class="img-responsive" alt="Kiwitiki's Submarine">
  </div>
  <div class="col-lg-4 col-md-4 col-sm-4 col-xs-6">
    <img src="Content/gdquest-game-design-portfolio-2.png" class="img-responsive" alt="Kiwitiki's Submarine">
  </div>
  <div class="col-lg-4 col-md-4 col-sm-4 col-xs-6">
    <img src="Content/gdquest-game-design-portfolio-3.png" class="img-responsive" alt="Kiwitiki's Submarine">
  </div>
</div>
